vehicles.description: Several vehicles are visible in the two lanes ahead, with red brake lights indicating that they are slowing down or will come to a stop.
vehicles.explanation: These vehicles directly affect driving behaviors, as the vehicle itself must adjust its speed and maintain a safe following distance to prevent collisions.

traffic signs.description: An overhead gantry displays direction information, with orange and white signs indicating a detour or lane closure ahead. There is also a blue directional sign on the right.
traffic signs.explanation: This sign indicates that the traffic pattern ahead has changed; it is necessary to drive cautiously and a lane change may be required.

barriers.description: There is a concrete barrier on the right side of the vehicle, extending parallel to our lane.
barriers.explanation: This obstacle restricts lane changes and requires the vehicle to stay within the lane on its side of the road.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the given traffic image, several vehicles are visible in the two lanes ahead, with red brake lights indicating that they are slowing down or will come to a stop. These vehicles directly affect driving behaviors, as the vehicle itself must adjust its speed and maintain a safe following distance to prevent collisions.

An overhead gantry displays direction information, with orange and white signs indicating a detour or lane closure ahead. There is also a blue directional sign on the right. This sign indicates that the traffic pattern ahead has changed; it is necessary to drive cautiously and a lane change may be required.

Additionally, there is a concrete barrier on the right side of the vehicle, extending parallel to our lane. This obstacle restricts lane changes and requires the vehicle to stay within the lane on its side of the road.

driving_suggestion: Your vehicle should maintain a safe distance from the car ahead, monitor their behavior, and be prepared to slow down in case they do. Additionally, you should pay attention to overhead road signs for navigation tips and lane positioning, and be ready to respond appropriately to signals when approaching traffic lights cautiously. Due to the presence of obstacles, it is advised to stay within your lane. Considering the deceleration of vehicles ahead, overhead diversion signs, and concrete barriers, you should be prepared to slow down or even stop and follow the indicated diversion route if necessary. Keep an eye on road conditions and traffic patterns to respond to any unexpected changes. Carefully follow lane markings and do not attempt to overtake using the opposite lane.

1.description and explanation: This object appears to be a piece of garbage on the road. It may require the ego car to adjust its driving path to avoid running over the debris, which could potentially cause damage to the vehicle or create unsafe driving conditions.
